column3: News; Phnom Penh: At 4.40 am on 27 November 2018
column4: an electricity pole exploded into ------flames------ along Road 173 and the corner of  416.------The blaze could not be tackled immediately because EDC to first disconnect the electricity supply.------The fire was out by 5:15 am.------https://www.postnews.com.kh/local/390427------
